Dictate needs your permission to use the microphone. Click the button below to grant this permission.
Dictate must be activated as a keyboard in the settings. Click on the button below to enable this.
Set API key and finish setup
How to switch to Dictate keyboard
You can switch between your normal keyboard and Dictate at any time. Simply click on the keyboard status icon below your standard keyboard and select Dictate. Have fun with it. ğŸ’ª
Start recording as soon as you switch to Dictate keyboard
Use custom Whisper API server ğŸ› ï¸
Invalid custom API host. Open settings to correct it?
Your custom API server has to start with \'http:\' or \'https:\'. Please check this again.
Dictate has been updated. View changes?

v1.4

- You can now pause and resume while recording your voice. â¯ï¸

- During recording, other media are now paused and then continued. ğŸ’¡

- Long-click on the keyboard-switch-button opens input method picker âŒ¨ï¸

- The translation function works more reliable now. ğŸ’ª

- Added German app translation ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª
If you like Dictate, I would be very happy about a small donation to support this project. ğŸ¥°\n\n

v1.5

- In the settings, you can now store a system prompt for Whisper to guide speech recognition in a certain direction (e.g. specify special words in advance or influence the punctuation and filler words). âœï¸

- After a failed transcription, you can now resend the last recording. ğŸ”„

- Holding down the delete button for longer now speeds up the deletion process. ğŸš€

- A donate button has been added in the settings. ğŸ¤

- Some design changes and bug fixes have been made. âœ¨
Enable rewording of recognised text with OpenAI\'s GPT models
Below you can create and edit your prompts for rewording using OpenAI\'s GPT models.
You have no prompts created.\nClick the button below to add one.
Are you sure to delete this prompt?
Enter a name for this prompt
Enter an instruction here as to what the GPT model should do with your text.\nIf you have selected \"requires text selection\", your spoken text will be sent automatically.
Do you like Dictate? I would be happy to receive a rating in the PlayStore. ğŸ˜‡
The Dictate keyboard isn\'t enabled in the system settings anymore. Do you want to open the system keyboard settings to correct this?
If you like Dictate, I would be very happy about a small. ğŸ¥°
You haven\'t created any prompts yet.
You have to set at least one character.

I want you to act as a French translator. I will speak to you in any language and you will detect the language, translate it and answer in the French version of my text. I want you to only reply the correction, the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations and don\'t write quotation marks at start and end.

Summarise the provided text. Do not add any new information or change the writing style. Just make sure that the text is shorter. Only output the summarised text, without any further information and without inverted commas at the beginning or end. Also make sure that you retain the input language of the text.
Insert a Unicode emoji symbol with a red heart. Only output the emoji, with no other text or characters.
"Tell me a funny joke. Only output the joke, without any further explanation. "

v2.0

This update brings some major changes that make Dictate a truly powerful tool:

- In the settings, you can now define your own rewording prompts. This allows you to have dictated text revised by ChatGPT, offering endless possibilities. You will find some example prompts in the settings that you can use as guides. ğŸ’¡

- The previous translation function has been removed, as you can now translate more flexibly with the rewording prompts. âŒ

- When you hold down the Enter button, you can now swipe to quickly insert characters without having to switch to another keyboard. You can set up to 8 custom characters in the settings. ğŸ”¤

- Dictate now uses GPT-4o-mini to reduce costs. I plan to let you choose the GPT model for rewording in the future. ğŸ’¸

- Some design changes and bug fixes have been made. âœ¨
